metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1804 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
accountsservice no longer drops permissions when writing .pam_environment

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1804` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

accountsservice - 22.07.5-2ubuntu1.3
gir1.2-accountsservice-1.0 - 22.07.5-2ubuntu1.3
libaccountsservice0 - 22.07.5-2ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is caused by the fix for CVE-2020-16126 being reverted

criterions.comment: accountsservice package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '22.07.5-2ubuntu1.3').
